subject: Order SSN4111
description_text:
Good morning, I'm sending the following email to find out the status of the
second part of my order. Since my order consisted of a handbrake and a
H-gear/sequential shifter, the announcement initially stated that shipping
for the second item would begin on December 15th. However, as of today, it
hasn't shipped yet. Any news? Thank you so much!

conversations.body_text:
Good morning, I am writing to follow up on my previous email regarding the
status of my order. I look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you

---------- Forwarded message ---------
Da: Alex Bonifacino <alex.bonifacino@gmail.com>
Date: Mer 17 Dic 2025, 10:51
Subject: Order SSN4111
To:

Good morning, I wrote to you five days ago to inquire about my order. When
I purchased it, it was stated that shipments of the H- and Sequential
gearboxes would begin on December 15th. It's the 21st, and I have no
information about it. Could you please reply? Thank you!

Il Ven 19 Dic 2025, 19:43 Alex Bonifacino <alex.bonifacino@gmail.com> ha
